name: The Death Killer
description:
There are always both good and bad people in society. Think about the red people as the evils living with us. Your objective is to kill every last one of them in desired time to save the city. Although killing is bad, it is good for society. However, be careful! Don't harm the innocent. Create the chaos by killing them to earn extra time before it's too late!!

The Death killer is a 3D game built in Unity3D for Hack-a-Jam 2021. We appreciate your comments and feedback. If you have any, please let us know.

Also, let us know your best score! We would love to know that.

Thank you very much for reading this.

Controls:

Move Forward: W / Up Arrow

Move Backward: S / Down Arrow

Move Left: A / Left Arrow

Move Right: D / Right Arrow

Killing red will give you +100 points and 10 seconds. But killing an orange will take 50 points and 20 seconds away from you. Also, don't hit the city infrastructures. It's your duty to keep it safe and 5 seconds will be taken from you if you hit the walls.
